name: Convergence Compulsion: The Satisfaction of a Job Well Done
name_original: Convergence Compulsion: The Satisfaction of a Job Well Done
description:
Made for Wizard Jam 8, the Idle Thumbs community game jam.

Currently a one-level prototype, but I'll be adding more levels before the end of the month, whereupon I will table the project indefinitely.

Goal: Help the civilian (let's call him Nick) get to the other side

Controls: WASD + Mouse. Requires two buttons and a mouse wheel. R to restart the map if you need to. Escape to bring up menu.
